These experiments were carried out at the Mexican Petroleum Institute, which is close to industrial areas with pollutant sources and is located in the trajectory of the prevailing winds. The IMP also had facilities to monitor ozone, nitrogen oxides, oxides of sulfur and carbon monoxide.
